house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1997 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Integrity Realtors RE/MAX Integrity Realtors
